medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began slowly since age 7 years, diagnosed at age 10 with normal tension glaucoma and treated. Visual acuity decreased progressively.
medical_history.family_history: A paternal great-grandfather lost vision in both eyes; the cause is unknown. Four patients had a family history of DOA, and one had a family history of optic atrophy, not otherwise specified.
